title: Random Real Range Number Generator
name: LGF_RandomRange_Real
description: This function generates a random value in defined limits with each call. The random number has the data type Real in the specified range.

input.name: minValue
input.description: Minimum value of the range of the random number - lower border

input.name: maxValue
input.description: Maximum value of the range of the random number - upper border

output.name: subfunctionStatus
output.description: Status or return value of called blocks

return_value.description: Random Real number in the predefined range
